author: rhuijben
msg: To allow moving working copies, we should store relative paths in the
workqueue. To make this work add a few missing arguments to wq build functions
and add a wri_abspath argument to svn_wc__db_to_relpath.
Currently the conversion function allows reading absolute paths from the
(svn_wc__db_to_relpath): Accept a wri_abspath, to allow operations between
(svn_wc__wq_build_file_move): Add wri_abspath argument to allow converting
to relative paths when moving from a sub working copy.
